channel.title: Won't let me run my client! -- Please help me!
channel.description:
It used to work, but just suddenly when i turned on the computer i couldn't
This is my problem!
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2ngzuvq.png[/img]
@echo off Title Client color 0a "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 echo Client is loading... Pause
I got windows 7, and done the Classpath stuff.
If it help i use delta 317.
Please help me!

item.title: Won't let me run my client! -- Please help me!
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Try this:

@echo off Title XLdarkwingLX's Fix color 0a "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 echo Client is loading... Pause

Read full topic
